item.title: India urges BRICS to tackle deficits as bloc rallies against U.S. tariffs
item.description: China has racked up a $77.7 billion trade surplus with India this year as of August, 16% higher compared to the level a year earlier.

item.title: Who was Trump ally and conservative activist Charlie Kirk?
item.description: Google trends showed a spike in searches of the phrase, "Who is Charlie Kirk" as news spread of the conservative activist's shooting on Wednesday.

item.title: Manhunt for Charlie Kirk shooter expands after two people detained had no links to killing, FBI says
item.description: Authorities are searching for the gunman who assassinated political activist Charlie Kirk at an event in Utah. Kirk was a close ally of President Dona...

item.title: Trump appeals order blocking him from firing Fed Governor Lisa Cook
item.description: The Supreme Court is expected to make the final decision on the question of whether President Trump has legal cause to remove Cook from the Federal Re...

item.title: Trump presses European Union to impose 100% tariffs on India and China to pressure Putin
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has asked the European Union to hit China and India with tariffs of up to 100% over the countries' Russia oil purchases.
